summary.span: 控制访问 HTTP Internet 资源的权限。

span.span: Controls rights to access HTTP Internet resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供一组方法和属性，用于控制对 Internet 资源的访问。 provides a set of methods and properties to control access to Internet resources. 基于创建时设置的，你可以使用 来提供对资源的受限或不受限制的访问 。You can use a to provide either restricted or unrestricted access to your resource, based on the that is set when the is created. 通过使用以下参数集中的一组调用其构造函数来创建实例：Create a instance by calling its constructor using one of the following sets of parameters: - 无参数。No parameters. 默认 为 。The default is . - 。A . 指定 以允许在目标类中使用任何 URI，或指定 仅允许访问通过使用方法指定的 uri 。Specify either to allow any URI to be used in the target class, or to allow access only to URIs that you specify through the use of the method. - 值和 URI 字符串。A value and a URI string. 指定的 URI 具有值授予的权限 。The specified URI has permissions granted by the value. - 说明符和 URI 正则表达式。A specifier and URI regular expression. 并 保存已向其授予访问权限的 uri。The and hold the URIs to which you have granted access permission. 若要将 URI 添加到其中一个列表，请使用 。To add a URI to either of these lists, use . 如果 作为 参数传递，则 URI 将添加到 。If you pass as the parameter, the URI will be added to the . 允许连接到与匹配的 Uri 的目标类 。 will allow connections to your target class with URIs matching the . > [!CAUTION] > 若要拒绝对 Internet 资源的访问，必须拒绝对该资源的所有可能路径的访问。To deny access to an Internet resource, you must deny access to all the possible paths to that resource. 这要求 在将 state 参数设置为的情况下调用 。This requires calling with state parameter set to . 更好的方法是只允许访问特定资源。A better approach is to allow access to the specific resource only. 有关此主题的详细信息，请参阅 [Using The Deny 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hk3b9142(v=vs.100)) 主题。For more information about this subject, refer to the [Using the Deny Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hk3b9142(v=vs.100)) topic. > [!NOTE] > 只需使用资源规范路径，拒绝访问。You need to deny access using only the resource canonical path. 无需使用路径的所有语法变化形式。There is no need to use all the path's syntactical variations. > [!NOTE] > 在 与提供给构造函数的正则表达式自变量进行比较之前，将从中去除用户名和默认端口信息 。User name and default port information is stripped from the before the comparison with the regular expression argument that is supplied to the constructor. 如果正则表达式包含用户信息或默认端口号，则所有传入 的都将无法与正则表达式匹配。If the regular expression contains user information or the default port number, then all incoming s will fail to match the regular expression. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用创建的新实例 。The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance of using a . 其他主机将添加到的 "连接" 和 "接受" 列表中 。Additional hosts are added to the connect and accept list of . 最后，将 "连接" 和 "接受" 列表显示到控制台。Finally, the connect and accept list are displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[WebPermission_Regex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Regex/CPP/regex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebPermission_Regex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Regex/CS/regex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebPermission_Regex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Regex/VB/regex.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的值 `state` 为 或 ，分别为所有安全变量生成完全限制或完全不受限制的访问。The value of the `state` parameter is either or , respectively yielding fully restricted or fully unrestricted access to all security variables. 如果指定 ，则可以使用授予对单个 uri 的访问权限 。If you specify , then you can give access to individual URIs using . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个实例 ，并提供对特定 url 的访问权限。The following example creates an instance of and gives access rights to specific URLs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化 并授予其目标权限以建立远程主机连接，或使用参数所描述的 URI 接受远程主机连接 `uriRegex` 。This constructor initializes a and grants its target permission to either make a remote host connection or accept a remote host connection using the URI described by the `uriRegex` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 建议 `uriRegex` 使用 、 和 标志创建。It is recommended that you create `uriRegex` using the , , and flags. > [!NOTE] > 将根据相关正则表达式的列表（ 以两种方式 (或) 检查候选 URI 字符串。A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions ( or ) in two ways. 首先，根据相应的列表检查候选 URI 字符串;如果没有匹配项，则将候选 URI 字符串转换为 ，并根据相应的列表进行检查。First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a and checked against the appropriate list. ## Examples 下面的示例使用指定的连接权限创建的新实例 。The following example creates a new instance of with connect rights for the specified . param.name: access

summary.span: 将具有指定访问权限的指定 URI 字符串添加到当前 。

span.span: Adds the specified URI string with the specified access rights to the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已指定 为 ，请使用 以允许 `uriString` 在目标类中使用。If you have specified as the , use to permit the use of `uriString` in the target class. `uriString`目标类可使用的方式由指定 `access` 。The way that `uriString` can be used by the target class is specified by `access`. 指定 作为访问参数，以将参数指定的 uri 添加 `uriString` 到 uri 接受字符串列表，或指定 为访问参数以将 URI 添加到 uri 连接字符串列表。Specify as the access parameter to add the URI specified by the `uriString` parameter to the list of URI accept strings, or specify as the access parameter to add the URI to the list of URI connect strings. > [!NOTE] > 对的调用 将不起任何作用，因为授予所有 uri 的权限。Calling on will have no effect, because permission is granted to all URIs. > [!NOTE] > 将根据相关正则表达式的列表（ 以两种方式 (或) 检查候选 URI 字符串。A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions ( or ) in two ways. 首先，根据相应的列表检查候选 URI 字符串;如果没有匹配项，则将候选 URI 字符串转换为 ，并根据相应的列表进行检查。First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a and checked against the appropriate list. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将访问权限添加到特定 URL 字符串。The following example demonstrates how to add access rights to particular URL strings. [!code-cpp[WebPermission_Intersect#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Intersect/CPP/webpermission_intersect.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebPermission_Intersect#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Intersect/CS/webpermission_intersect.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebPermission_Intersect#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebPermission_Intersect/VB/webpermission_intersect.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已指定 为 ，请使用 允许 `uriRegex` 在目标类中使用。If you have specified as the , use to allow the use of `uriRegex` in the target class. 指定 作为 `access` 参数，以将参数指定的 uri 添加 `uriRegex` 到 uri 接受字符串列表，或指定 为访问参数以将 uri 添加到 uri 连接字符串列表。Specify as the `access` parameter to add the URI specified by the `uriRegex` parameter to the list of URI accept strings, or specify as the access parameter to add the URI to the list of URI connect strings. > [!NOTE] > 对实例调用 将不会产生任何影响，因为向所有 uri 授予了权限。Calling on an instance will have no effect as permission is granted to all URIs. > [!NOTE] > 建议 `uriRegex` 使用 、 和 标志创建。It is recommended that you create `uriRegex` using the , , and flags. > [!NOTE] > 将根据相关正则表达式的列表（ 以两种方式 (或) 检查候选 URI 字符串。A candidate URI string is checked against the list of relevant regular expressions ( or ) in two ways. 首先，根据相应的列表检查候选 URI 字符串;如果没有匹配项，则将候选 URI 字符串转换为 ，并根据相应的列表进行检查。First, the candidate URI string is checked against the appropriate list; then, if there is no match, the candidate URI string is converted into a and checked against the appropriate list. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 为指定 URI 提供访问权限。The following example uses to give access rights for the specified URI. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回一个 ，它包含与当前实例相同的权限 `target` 。 returns a that contains those permissions that are common in both `target` and the current instance. 此方法将重写 并实现以支持 接口。This method overrides and is implemented to support the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用两个现有实例的逻辑交集创建的实例 。The following example shows how to create an instance of using the logical intersection of two existing instances.
